ModMetaData.name: Fast Spreading Grass 2.0
ModMetaData.author: DantheWAANN
ModMetaData.description:
Grass now grows faster. Grass should be fully grown after 1 day instead of 2.5 days normally.
This makes grass re-growth faster after fires or periods of falling snow; for those times where the whole map seems deprived of any grass ...
Original mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1228372243
Original logo is from http://game-icons.net/ and is licensed under CC BY 3.0.
